name: Apocclipse
description:
Brontë is a girl who was born without hearing and spends her days with a hearing aid pretending she can't hear people and doing what she does. She particularly likes the sound of drums because she finds it the clearest. Her drumming delivers a deadly blow to her enemies and adds a touch of life to a deadly, apocalyptic world.

Control:

Dialogue Line: Space

Jump: Space
